name: gldt-monorepo
description: GLDT frontend app and GLDT canister
author: GoldDAO

scripts.build: npm run build:backdid && npm run build:back && npm run build:frontends
scripts.build:frontends: npm run build:gldt_swap_app && npm run build:gldt_landing_page && npm run build:gldt_explorer && npm run build:gld_dashboard
scripts.build:back: scripts/build-canister.sh gldt_core && scripts/build-canister.sh gldt_fee_compensation && scripts/build-canister.sh icp_neuron && scripts/build-canister.sh sns_rewards
scripts.build:backdid: scripts/build-canister.sh --wasmonly gldt_core && scripts/build-canister.sh --wasmonly gldt_fee_compensation && scripts/build-canister.sh --wasmonly sns_rewards && npm run build:candid && npm run build:declarations && npm run build:back
scripts.build:candid: scripts/generate-did.sh gldt_core & scripts/generate-did.sh gldt_fee_compensation & scripts/generate-did.sh sns_rewards
scripts.lint: npm run lint:back && npm run lint:frontends
scripts.lint:frontends: npm run lint:gldt_swap_app && npm run lint:gldt_landing_page && npm run lint:gldt_explorer
scripts.start: dfx stop && dfx start --background --clean && npm run deploy
scripts.test: npm run build:backdid && cargo tarpaulin --count -o html
scripts.postinstall: rustup update; rustup component add clippy; echo 'If installing locally, you should also ensure that ic-wasm is installed (cargo install ic-wasm), as well as wasmtime (see https://wasmtime.dev ).'
